title: South Africa offers the most exciting best destination wedding packages
text:
Travel Articles | July 15, 2015 
Getting married soon and still not sure of a wedding destination? There are many couples like you that face the same dilemma. 
Let's face it - in today's times one comes across an umpteen number of places that could serve as ideal wedding locations. Be it outdoors, indoors, by the poolside, in wedding halls, in community centers and parks, in hotels or even oneâ€™s own house. However, while these destinations are standard and decent and frequented by the masses, none of them is an exotic location that could serve as a best destination wedding package. Today there are more choices available than before when it comes to choosing the best destination wedding package and couples make their choice of the best destination wedding package based on several factors. These factors include: - The price of the venue and the destination including all services.- Location of the wedding destination and the facilities available at the venue.- The reputation or popularity of the wedding destination in social circles.- Whether reservations are available at the time of the wedding- What are the ratings of the wedding destination on Facebook?- Comparison of the different wedding destinations and selection of the best destination wedding package. It has been found that today young couples want to do something unique and different - something that is away from traditional style and has not been done before. The choice of a wedding destination is one such item on their list that they want to change. For them the wedding destination has to be interesting, picturesque and memorable. While there are many wedding destinations that are available, some of the most memorable and beautiful wedding destination are mentioned as follows:- The hilly regions and resorts in Mozambique.- Game drives and Safaris in resorts located in the Serengeti and Masai Mara wildlife sanctuaries of Kenya.- The beautiful islands in Seychelles that have sparkling blue water and a rich marine life.- The African tribes and traditional African culture of Zanzibar.- The Pyramids, the Sphinx and the Suez Canal in Egypt.- The picturesque Reunion Island close to Mauritius.- The Table Mountains in South Africa. It is advisable for couples to look at all options when planning for their best destination wedding package and honeymoon. They should look for a service provider that is experienced and has several years of experience in planning weddings and honeymoons. The service provider should have tons of ideas and suggestions and should have experienced and trained staff to take care of all the wedding planning that includes activities such as preparation of guest list, printing of wedding cards, selection of wedding destination, menu for the wedding dinner, entertainment events for the wedding, selection of the venue for the honeymoon, ticketing and travel itinerary planning for the couple, their family and guests. It may also be necessary to have a tour guide available during the wedding at an exotic location so he/ she can inform the guests about the wedding destination and its history and relevance.
